Redridge Goulash

Chef Breanna of Lakeshire wants five pieces of Tough Condor Meat, five Great Goretusk Snouts and five helpings of Crisp Spider Meat.

Description

Nothing would please me more than to make you some Redridge Goulash. But there's a slight problem. During the recent orc uprising I fed the entire brigade of Stormwind troops. My cupboard is now bare. But if you can provide me with the ingredients, I'd be happy to oblige.

Just bring me five pieces of Tough Condor Meat, five Great Goretusk Snouts and five helpings of Crisp Spider Meat.

Reward

You will receive:
Redridge Goulash
Recipe: Redridge Goulash

Progress

I still need five pieces of Tough Condor Meat, five Great Goretusk Snouts and five helpings of Crisp Spider Meat.

Completion

Well done, <name>. Such fine specimens too! And here is your delicious delicacy known as Redridge Goulash!

Gains

Upon completion of quests, get:
  • 1350 Experience
  • 100 Reputation with Stormwind
